item.title: Week 5 What Gets Counted, Counts!
item.description: Goals Listen Read Do Reflect Report Back Goals for this week uncover the ways in which ‘counting’ hides or highlights the past encounter CSVs, SQL, and R and how to do some basic statistics on archaeological information Listen Your browser does not support the audio element. Right-click and save-as this link to download the audio file Read D’Ignazio, Catherine and Klein, L. 2020. ‘What gets counted, counts’. From Data Feminism link Labrador, Angela.
